== Definitional issues ==
 
== Definitional issues ==
−   −
Love has been nicely defined in 2006 by F.V. LOUVEL as "Self-understanding of each other's desire". This is applicable, obviously, only in the context of a bipart relationship composed of hetero- or homo-sexual individuals.
       
Dictionaries tend to define ''love'' as deep affection or fondness.<ref>''Oxford Illustrated American Dictionary'' (1998) + ''Merriam-Webster Collegiate Dictionary'' (2000).</ref> In colloquial use, according to polled opinion, the most favoured definitions of ''love'' include the words:<ref>[http://www.humanthermodynamics.com/RP2-Love.html '04 Poll of 250 Chicagoans] – Institute of Human Thermodynamics (Chicago)</ref>
